column4: okay explain this, it chnaged the text cursor icon, and the link button icon, but not the main cursor YankDownUnder :P
Like I said, its odd that the cursor when hovering over text, changed, and the link hand changed, but the main cursor did not. I just want a black cursor!! haha
btw installed a custom theme, still didnt change the main cursor. ( i have oxygen, haha, it changes the 'loading' icon, link icon, and text icon (icon==cursor) but doesnt change the main plain cursor
there is a whole other selection dialog for cursors
I think it may be a problem with acpi though :O
kk, i'm not too well versed in the battery applet anyhow.
